name: Cook the Book: Turkey Salad
description: Two solid days of cooking have gone by and I'm happy, though a little exhausted. My Thanksgiving was a resounding success and everyone left full, happy, and armed with a bag of leftovers to last them well into mid-December. The...
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup pecans, toasted and roughly chopped
Freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine everything in a large airtight container. Refrigerate for 1 hour before serving. Store in the fridge for up to 3 days.
